message: When a entire population is dictated by an army laws . It s called occupation , occupation is not only occupation of the land but it is worth it's to be under military rules and laws in your daily life. Now these Israeli soldiers are Hero, they bring to light a collective low moral of the Israeli society that is silent knowing what's really going on in the Judea and Samaria area and East Jerusalem, It is not necessarily an option to have 2 states .but what is necessary is that all people living on the same ground is being ruled by an unique civil entity.a country can be federated it s help to solve the demographic conflict by keeping the unity of the civil laws. If *Shovrim Shtika* went to look outside Israel it is because inside Israel corruption within the bureaucracy and legal system is High, just look what happened within the police and as well cases within the army and all level in all different mimistries.

How do I pretend and what is your point once again? My comment specifically addresses that those who condone are idiots. I don't know everyone who does to determine if they are intelligent or not, rational or not but I can deduct they must be idiots because in a society ruled by law, murder is unacceptable.
